element.name: BoltOnMustBeParticular
element.label: The Bolt On must be particular

element.name: CancellableBoltOnType
element.label: Bolt On Type can be suspended

element.label: Bolt On Type can be subscribed in subscriber's suspended status

element.name: DeferredValidity
element.label: Bolt On Type with deferred validity

element.name: AccumBoltOnTypeWithExpRemainder
element.label: Accumulative Bolt On Type with expired remainder

element.name: GenerationOfExpirationNotice
element.label: Generation of notifications before the Bolt On type expired

element.name: TicksPreviousNotification
element.label: Number of ticks before expiration for BoltOn expiration event

element.name: LastFreeUnitsInTheCycle
element.label: Last free units in the cycle (seconds/bytes)

element.name: HTMLContent
element.content: Remaining session information must be included in:

element.name: byRenewalExhaustion
element.label: Send event of Renewal by exhaustion

element.name: noRenewalbyExhaustion
element.label: Send event of No Renewal by exhaustion

element.name: renewalSubperiod
element.label: Send event of Renewal by exhaustion

element.name: noRenewalSubperiod
element.label: Send event of No Renewal by exhaustion

element.name: TextField
element.label: The reamining units at the end of a cycle are maintained for the next cycle (Rollover)

element.name: TextField1
element.label: Number of cycles in which the remaning units can be maintained (latency)

element.name: TextField2
element.label: Percentage of units that are dragged from past cycle to current one

element.name: TextField9
element.label: Bolt On validity in each renewal

element.name: ValidBoltOnForUsageControl
element.label: Valid Bolt On for Usage Controls

element.name: SectionHeader1
element.label: Threshold Set for Bolt On Value
